title: Random Fps Drops in 3v3
body: So I have been playing 3v3 alot and recently approx like 2 months ago I started randomly lagging during game. Let me explain- So if i log on lol and play one game of 3v3 nothing happens however if i do the second one right after i get like 4-5 fps from my normal 70 at high from about 3-10 minutes in the game also if it has been like 3-4 mins after the lag begun it goes away but comes back after being 5 minutes in normal i do not have this issue in any other map , please help! it makes my favourite gamemode unable to play!

replies.body:
Let's first make sure all of those game files are still working properly before digging too much further. Run a quick repair through the game client options, then test it out in a custom 3v3 if you can!

If that doesn't help go ahead and run through the other steps outlined in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for some other basic troubleshooting and let me know how that goes.

So I ran through the repair also checked possible wrong things in FPS GUIDE doesn't seem to change however im still lagging even in costum 3v3 or normal 3v3. whatever is going on doesn't seem to effect other queue's im planning on cleaning my whole pc soon too anyways hope it will help, if you have any other ideas lemme know , thanks in advance
